name: Bandit
description:
Bandit is a Western 2D puzzle-platformer! Collect coins and diamonds on your journey chasing down the elusive Boss Ghoul. Blast blocks and use bombs to trap ghouls and reach otherwise unreachable areas. Will you be able to avoid death and defeat the Boss Ghoul and his mighty Ghouliaths?

  • 20 unique and beautiful levels
  • Local two-player action
  • Gamepad supported
  • Original acoustic soundtrack
